mutants.code:
import math

def simplify_fraction(numerator, denominator):
    gcd = math.gcd(numerator, denominator)
    return f'{numerator // gcd}{denominator // gcd}'

import math

def simplify_fraction(numerator, denominator):
    gcd = math.gcd(numerator, denominator)
    return f'{numerator / gcd}/{denominator // gcd}'

import math

def simplify_fraction(numerator, denominator):
    gcd = math.gcd(numerator, denominator)
    return f'{numerator * gcd}/{denominator // gcd}'

import math

def simplify_fraction(numerator, denominator):
    gcd = math.gcd(numerator, denominator)
    return f'{numerator // gcd}/{denominator / gcd}'

import math

def simplify_fraction(numerator, denominator):
    gcd = math.gcd(numerator, denominator)
    return f'{numerator // gcd}/{denominator * gcd}'
